review_title: A very formal environment, no clutter management
pros: - SNV is a global organisation, you'll get a lot to learn there. - SNV respects employee privacy and security. - The safeguarding policy is one of the best in Bangladesh. - Working with WASH sector colleagues kept myself in a very friendly environment. - Never undervalue its staffs.
cons: - You'll get less networking opportunity if you work at field. - Learning curve is a bit slow comparing with other WASH organisations in Bangladesh, but learning opportunities are there.
